message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. This is an excellent value considering its worth to you is $150. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. In response, I would like to offer the product at $110. This allows us both to reach a fair agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter your offer with $105 for the product.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to accept $110 for it. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
